tag_list: james-holmes, internet-business-training, information-product-publisher, affiliate-marketing, social-media-consultant, blogger, multiple-income-streams-coach, home-business-coach
overview:
James Holmes provides coaching, resources, and tools for network marketing, affiliate marketing, and direct sales. He teaches a system that duplicates utilizing a marketing funnel that includes multiple funded proposals, integrates social media, creates pre-qualified prospects, consistent cash flow, and duplication.

James manages several blogs in four primary niches; home based business, social media, attraction and manifestation, mortgage banking and real estate. James host a weekly training podcast that is available for download through iTunes.

James has been quoted as follows:

“I want to share my journey with others with the hope that I can further achieve my life’s purpose; to sow increase in the lives of others by co-creating wealth and abundance.”
